name: Desygner Exporter
description:
A simple plugin to turn your Figma designs into fully customizable Desygner Templates in seconds. 

Export your designs in a few minutes and wherever you want. You can choose in which Desygner workspace and in which collection you want to add your new templates.


How it works:

  1. Select your designs or frames
  2. Choose Export to Desygner 
  3. Select your workspace 
  4. Select your collection
  5. Click on Export
  6. Done! You will see your templates in Desygner. 


Once your designs are in Desygner you will be able to:

  • Define what people can or cannot change. 
  • Then anyone can create new assets following your brand guidelines.
  • Your users will be able to customize content using our lightweight Design editor.
